amendment.description: Pursuant to the instructions of the House in the Motion to Recommit the amendment was considered.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lofgren.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
